settings.ingredients_list:
• 125g butter, softened
  • 1/3 cup caster sugar
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 egg
  • 1 ½ cups self-raising flour
  • ½ cup desiccated coconut
  • 2 cups shredded coconut
  • Extra 1/4 cup caster sugar
  • Extra 1 egg, whisked
  • The Farmer's Wife Apricot Jam

settings.method_steps:
Step 1

Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan forced. Grease and line a 30cm x 20cm slab pan with baking paper.

Step 2

Using an electric beater, beat butter, sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add egg and beat until just combined. Stir flour and desiccated coconut into the butter mixture. Spoon mixture into prepared pan and spread evenly with the back of a spoon. Bake for 15 minutes or until lightly golden. Cool.

Step 3

Spread apricot jam over the slice. Combine shredded coconut and extra sugar in a bowl. Add the extra egg and stir until combined. Spoon and spread mixture over jam. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Cool. Remove from cake pan and cut into fingers to serve.
